articles.title: R.B.I. Baseball 21 returns to Xbox, PlayStation, Switch in March - Polygon
articles.description: MLB Advanced Media announced that RBI Baseball 21 will launch March 16, 2021 for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Windows PC, and Xbox One. Tim Anderson of the Chicago White Sox is the game’s cover star.
articles.content: Leads off March 16, a month before MLB The Show 21 launches

articles.title: Destiny 2 fans do 12-player raids, thanks to new glitch - Polygon
articles.description: Over the weekend, Guardians discovered a new glitch allowing for 12-player fireteams in Destiny 2. This allows players to double their group size, turning Destiny 2’s most challenging group content into a parade of nonsense and chaos.
